sentences.en: An older woman, pink-cheeked and tweedy, appeared in the doorway.
sentences.cn: 一位面颊绯红、一副乡下贵族打扮的老妇人出现在门口。

sentences.en: I like the older one.This one.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢年纪大点儿的这个。这个。

sentences.en: I：Who is older, your sister or you?
sentences.cn: I：谁年纪较大？ 是你的姐妹还是你？

sentences.en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
sentences.cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

sentences.en: Many of the older pitmen may never work again.
sentences.cn: 很多年纪更大的矿工也许再也不干活了。

sentences.en: Older mothers tend to be too idealistic about the pleasures of motherhood.
sentences.cn: 较年长的母亲往往对身为人母的乐趣过于理想化。

sentences.en: She was about thirty, ten years older than the youngsters ragging her.
sentences.cn: 她大概有30岁，比那些嘲弄她的年轻人大10岁。

sentences.en: Some of the older telephones still only accept tokens.
sentences.cn: 一些较老式的电话机仍然只收代币。

sentences.en: The children give her hell, particularly the older boys.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子让她吃足了苦头，特别是那些年龄大一点的男孩子。

sentences.en: The judge thought he'd been led astray by older children.
sentences.cn: 法官认为他已经被那些年长的孩子们带坏了。

sentences.en: The older child should be able to prepare a simple meal.
sentences.cn: 那个年纪稍大的孩子应当会做一顿简单的饭菜。

sentences.en: The older people had stopped being neighbourly to each other.
sentences.cn: 老人们彼此已不再友好相待。

sentences.en: The older people were left to carry on as best they could.
sentences.cn: 年纪大一点的人被留下来，奋力坚持。

sentences.en: The older you get the more distrustful you become.
There are plenty of plus points about being an older first-time mum.
sentences.cn: 年龄稍长再做妈妈有很多好处。

sentences.en: Underage youths can obtain alcohol from their older friends.
sentences.cn: 未到法定年龄的青少年可以从年龄较大的朋友那里弄到酒。

sentences.en: When he got older I nicknamed him Little Alf.
sentences.cn: 当他大一点时，我给他起了个“小阿尔夫”的绰号。

trans.tran_cn: 年长的，古老的(old的比较级 )
